articles.author: Ben Brasch
articles.title: Death toll rises in European floods, authorities say; more rain expected - The Washington Post
articles.description: At least seven people have died — five in Romania, one in Poland and one in Austria — since the rains began Friday, according to officials.
articles.content:
Catastrophic flooding has killed at least seven people in Central and Eastern Europe, where more severe weather is expected this week.
Floods or heavy snow have hit Austria, the Czech Republic, Germ… [+356 chars]

articles.description: This will be short and bittersweet. The WSJ editorial board fails to address the heart of the matter.
articles.content:
